thread.title: Attacker Accidentally Leaves Cellphone in Woman’s Cart After Beating Her
thread.title_full: Attacker Accidentally Leaves Cellphone in Woman’s Cart After Beating Her

author: John Falkenberg
title: Attacker Accidentally Leaves Cellphone in Woman’s Cart After Beating Her
text:
WATCH: Teen Who Walked To Work Every Day Surprised With New Car From Co-Workers 
AJC reported that the attacker, identified as Alexa Venderburg, was outraged and cursed at McClung to move out of her way. 
As she moved out of the way, she said something rude to Venderburg, and that’s when the assault began.   
Although there was animosity between the two women, McClung believed that Venderburg must have had issues beyond the argument to cause her to react so violently. 
“There had to be something wrong with her because you just don’t do that,” she told WSB-TV. “I had my glasses on and she just kept socking me in the glasses and then she socked me in my mouth because my mouth is real sore.” 
She claimed that her arms were also bruised with defensive wounds . 
Unfortunately for the attacker, she accidentally left her cellphone with McClung’s scooter, which is how she was identified. She was reportedly being sought by authorities.
